title: Runaway Nano-Swarm Zone Adventure #18
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Nano Containment Laboratory
rooms.description: A sterile white laboratory filled with humming equipment and flickering warning lights. Through reinforced glass windows, you see swirling clouds of metallic nano-particles consuming everything in their path. Emergency sirens wail as containment fields flicker. A workstation and storage lockers line the walls.

items.name: research terminal
items.description: A computer terminal displaying critical research data and warnings
items.text: CRITICAL ALERT: Nano-swarm breach imminent. Containment field at 23% integrity. Dr Chen's final log: The swarm activation code was the year of the first nanotech breakthrough - 2045. Only authorized personnel can access the security systems.

items.name: equipment storage lockers
items.description: A set of metal lockers containing lab equipment and supplies

items.name: hazmat gloves
items.description: Protective gloves for handling hazardous materials

items.name: level 3 security keycard
items.description: A high-level security card with Dr Chen's authorization code

items.name: laboratory desk
items.description: A cluttered desk covered with research papers and data tablets

items.name: Dr Chen research notes
items.description: Handwritten notes about the nano-swarm project
items.text: Project Log: The nano-swarms were designed by Lead Scientist Dr Chen at the Prometheus Research Facility. If containment fails, the emergency shutdown requires three security answers. Remember: my name, our location, and what stops the swarms - electromagnetic pulse.

items.name: reinforced observation window
items.description: A thick glass window showing the nano-swarm containment chamber beyond
items.text: Through the window you see millions of microscopic machines forming shifting metallic clouds. A display panel shows: SWARM DENSITY CRITICAL. CONTAINMENT BREACH IN 10 MINUTES.

items.name: reinforced containment door
items.description: A heavy security door with a card reader and biometric scanner

rooms.name: Security Control Room
rooms.description: A dimly lit control room filled with monitors displaying facility schematics and security feeds. Multiple screens show the nano-swarms spreading through sealed sections. A large control console dominates the center, and personnel files are scattered across workstations. The blast door to the shuttle bay is sealed tight.

items.name: security monitor array
items.description: Multiple screens showing different areas of the facility
items.text: Monitor feeds show: Containment Lab - CRITICAL. Research Wing - COMPROMISED. Shuttle Bay - SECURE. A sticky note on the monitor reads: 'Shuttle bay override code is in the personnel files.'

items.name: personnel file cabinet
items.description: A filing cabinet containing employee records and security clearances

items.name: personnel file for Dr Chen
items.description: An employee record with photo and details
items.text: Dr. Sarah Chen - Lead Scientist, Nanotechnology Division. Clearance Level: 5. Project: Adaptive Nano-Swarm Development. Emergency Contact: Prometheus Research Facility Main Office.

items.name: emergency override document
items.description: A classified document with emergency access codes
items.text: EMERGENCY PROTOCOLS: Shuttle bay override code: 7734. Use only in case of facility-wide evacuation. This code bypasses all security locks on the blast door.

items.name: main control console
items.description: A complex console with multiple screens and input terminals

items.name: portable EMP device
items.description: An electromagnetic pulse generator capable of disabling nano-swarms

items.name: display showing Dr Chen
items.description: A large display screen showing a pre-recorded warning message
items.text: Dr Chen's recorded message: 'If you're seeing this, containment has failed. The nano-swarms will consume the entire facility within the hour. You must reach the shuttle bay and evacuate immediately. Good luck.'

items.name: security blast door
items.description: A massive reinforced door leading to the shuttle bay. A keypad and security terminal block access.

password_questions.question: Who designed the nano-swarms?
password_questions.hint: Check the research notes and personnel files

password_questions.question: What is the name of this facility?
password_questions.hint: Look at Dr Chen's personnel file and research notes

password_questions.question: What can stop the nano-swarms?
password_questions.hint: Dr Chen's research notes mention the shutdown method

rooms.name: Emergency Shuttle Bay
rooms.description: A cavernous hangar bay with a sleek emergency shuttle sitting on the launch pad. Warning lights flash as automated systems prepare for emergency departure. Through the bay doors, you can see the facility exterior being consumed by spreading nano-swarms. A final security terminal guards the shuttle access.

items.name: shuttle bay override terminal
items.description: The final security terminal controlling shuttle launch authorization

items.name: shuttle launch codes
items.description: Authorization codes needed to activate the emergency shuttle

items.name: emergency evacuation shuttle
items.description: A small but fast spacecraft designed for emergency evacuations. Its engines are already warming up.
items.text: Shuttle status: READY FOR LAUNCH. Destination: Orbital Station Alpha. Flight time: 15 minutes. All systems nominal.

items.name: bay observation window
items.description: A large window showing the facility exterior
items.text: Through the window you see the nano-swarms spreading like a metallic plague, consuming walls, equipment, and everything in their path. The containment breach is total. You have minutes at most.

items.name: shuttle access hatch
items.description: The entrance to the emergency shuttle, now unlocked and ready for boarding

rooms.name: Orbital Safety
rooms.description: You're strapped into the shuttle as it blasts away from the doomed facility. Through the viewport, you watch the Prometheus Research Facility disappear beneath a writhing mass of nano-swarms. The shuttle's autopilot guides you safely to Orbital Station Alpha. You've survived the nano-swarm catastrophe!

items.name: shuttle viewport
items.description: A reinforced window showing the view of space and the facility below

items.name: communication system
items.description: The shuttle's comm system crackles to life with a message from Orbital Station Alpha welcoming you to safety

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You've escaped the Runaway Nano-Swarm Zone! As your shuttle docks with Orbital Station Alpha, you look back at the Prometheus Research Facility, now completely consumed by the rogue nano-swarms. Thanks to Dr Chen's notes and your quick thinking, you're the sole survivor. The facility will be sterilized from orbit, but you made it out alive. You win!
